home_card_1_text: Make your own unique sets of cards and use them to learn with pleasure.
home_card_2_text: Check out our ready-made collections of cards and find sets that suit you best.
home_card_3_text: Keep Informed with the latest news and developments on our website in the news section.
home_card_4_text: Our support service is always ready to assist you with any question.
choosing_theme: Select a theme that your like:
thanks_for_mail_2: If you have provided your email, we will respond as soon as possible!
set_title_text: Your title must not be empty and must not exceed 50 characters in length.
choose_category_text: To use search, enter the first few characters or write a new category (max. 30 characters):
choose_lang_text: In what language will your set of cards be?
set_instructions_text: Your instructions must not exceed 200 characters.
set_instructions_placeholder: Enter instructions for the set of cards
create_cards_text: Your question should not exceed 100 characters, and answers should be 30 characters or less.
